Function-Level Analysis.airDrop: Provides tokens to the caller if they have zero balance and support the token. Uses two modifiers (hasNoBalance and supportsToken) for checks.
Function-Level Analysis.supportsToken modifier: Ensures that the caller supports the token via a keccak256 hash check.
Function-Level Analysis.hasNoBalance modifier: Requires that the callerâ€™s balance is zero to proceed.

Decision Points.require(tokenBalance[msg.sender] == 0): Ensures the caller has zero balance to call airDrop.

Decision Points.require(keccak256(abi.encodePacked('Nu T: Ensures compatibility of the caller with the token.

State Transition Points: Updates tokenBalance of msg.sender in airDrop if all checks pass.
